Expected console output format for cc-websiteaudit
===================================================

The console reporter produces output in this structure:

Line 1: Empty line
Line 2: "Website Audit: <url>"
Line 3: "Date: <date>"
Line 4: "Pages Crawled: <number>"
Line 5: Empty line
Line 6: "Overall Grade: <grade> (<score>/100)"
Line 7: Separator line (dashes)

Per category:
"<Category Name>: <grade> (<score>/100)"
  For each check:
  "[+] <check name> - <detail>"     (PASS)
  "[!] <check name> - <detail>"     (WARN)
  "[X] <check name> - <detail>"     (FAIL)
  "[-] <check name> - <detail>"     (SKIP)

Quick Wins section:
"Quick Wins:"
  "1. <check name> (impact: <n>, effort: <n>)"
  "2. <check name> (impact: <n>, effort: <n>)"
  ...
